data.name: World of Guns:Texture Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode.
Current pack includes textures:
- patterns: wood, carbon, rust, scratches
- stickers: skulls, flames, flags, special stamps
In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns.
For each model user may have 3 slots of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional slots for each model. But overall can be maximum 6 slots
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This DLC unlocks package of the textures for PAINT mode. In the PAINT mode user may change textures of the models, add stickers and patterns. For each model user may have 3 slots of the paints, this DLC unlocks 3 additional slots for each model.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Italian, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP and higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP and higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
